phrases: - Ryuko!
Are you all right?!
It hurts!
It hurts like hell!
But it is what I deserve for being such a huge dumbass!
I cannot believe she is still alive after snapping her own Life Fibers!
By the way...
Nui's injuries are healing!
So she is indestructible, too?
It is the power of the Life Fibers inside her body.
It was a mistake to throw your Scissor Blade at me.
You cannot defeat me, and now I have both halves!
Get going, Senketsu!
Be with Ryuko!
Right!
I will just have to shred that dumb old Senketsu again!
I do not think so!
He used me as a springboard?!
Let us go, Ryuko!
Life Fiber Synchronize!
EPISODE 22 TELL ME HOW YOU FEEL
Harime!
She is cowing Harime through sheer intimidation, eh?
You stay put right there.
Aw, but I would tailored Junketsu just for you!
I will not let you wear that lame getup!
Quit while you are ahead.
I am never taking Senketsu off.
Mako and Satsuki's blood is flowing through Senketsu now.
He is way warmer and feels better on me than that monster, Junketsu!
- Ryuko!
Thank you for saying that!
Dummy, clothes do not cry!
You are getting all damp and gross!
You were so comfy, damn it!
I am so sorry!
What is with this friends garbage?
It is so gross I am going to barf!
Do not talk crap about it!
The word friends do not come close to covering it!
They are something more, something I cannot explain!
That is what Mako Mankanshoku and Senketsu are to me!
What, me?!
Yeah, you.
I cannot tell if you are weak or strong!
Like a woman who barges into your heart when you are not looking!
Or someone who cries, laughs and genuinely
worries about me even though he is clothing!
Bat-crap crazy people like that try their damndest to help me!
And I have to live up to that craziness!
You people only see one thing.
To make it so the whole world is cut from the same cloth Life Fibers.
But you see, I am never going to let that happen.
The world's better off having bat-crap crazy people wandering around it!
I did not understand a word of that, but you are so totally right, Ryuko!
If you do not understand, hush!
Darn it, that is why I hate humans!
If that is how you want it, go ahead and die without being understood ever!
Dad's Scissor Blade...
I finally have it back!
In that case, maybe I will make the people you are trying to protect attack you!
Have a taste of Mind Stitching!
It is no use!
Oops, sorry about that!
That was a decoy!
It is all over, Ryuko!
Yeah, for you.
MY ARMS!
My arms, my arms, my arms, my arms, my arms, my arms, my arms!
MY ARMS!
Do you have any idea how valuable my arms are?!
They are the arms of the Grand Couturier!
That is why I chopped'them off.
Kidding!
Even if you chop them off, they will pop right back, good as new!
Oops.
Clumsy me.
They can halt Life Fiber regeneration?
Those scissors can do even that?
Just give it up, Nui Harime!
This cannot be happening!
You are really making me angry!
Every last one of you!
I am pissed, I am pissed, I am pissed, I am pissed, I am pissed,
I am pissed, I am pissed, I am pissed, I am pissed, I am pissed!
Hououmaru!
You are not getting away!
Senketsu Shippu!
What the?
Ow!
I would better not do it, Ryuko.
You have lost a great deal of blood.
Chasing after them would be dangerous.
But we have still got these guys to deal with!
Hououmaru made a mistake because she was desperate to rescue Harime.
She is right!
Which makes this a golden opportunity!
It was nice of them to bring us both Life Fibers
and new members for the because!
Exactly.
Do not just stand around doing nothing, Elite Four, get to work!
Give me those!
Nonuple-mount Emergency Rescue Suction Device!
NONUPLE-MOUNT EMERGENCY RESCUE SUCTION DEVICE
You!
You are Hakodate of the Tennis Club...
TENNIS CLUB PRESIDENT OMIKO HAKODATE
BOXING CLUB PRESIDENT TAKAHARU FUKURODA
KUSANOSUKE YAGURUMA
And there is more!
TATAMU OTTE
AIZENBO FUGUHARA MAIMU OKURAHAMA
FORMER ACROBATICS CLUB
Medics!
Yes, madam!
Tend to the students who have been extracted!
On it!
All right, Mankanshoku family, let us help people for a change!
If they are buck-nekkid, they have got nothing to steal, so I am just not feeling it...
Mataro!
That is enough of that!
Ow!
I will do it, I will do it, I will work seriously!
Sewing Club, collect the Life Fibers!
Bring them to the lab AS SOON AS POSSIBLE!
Collection complete.
Let me out!
Who asked you for help?!
I have not been beaten yet!
Please calm yourself, Grand Couturier.
What can you possibly do in your condition?
Surely the task you must see to right now is the completion of Shinra-Koketsu.
How do you intend to apologize to Lady Ragyo for this fiasco,
losing both arms in a battle you did not need to fight?
Me? Apologize?
As if.
Hurry back to Honnouji Academy!
I will finish up Shinra-Koketsu!
And after I am done, I will teach you what
happens when someone mouths off to me.
If you finish Shinra-Koketsu, what happens to me is of no concern.
What shall I do with Junketsu?
Keep it in restraints for the time being.
You are not going to terminate it?
The battle is not over yet.
Planning to put it on again, huh?
Can you wear that monster?
I will not make the same mistake twice.
After you could not synchronize with Senketsu?
Stop it, Ryuko.
Satsuki risked her life to save you, too.
So what if she did?
That do not excuse the attitude she is given me all this time.
What do you want from me?
Let me belt you one.
Ryuko...
If I punch you without holding back and you are still on your feet,
I will admit that you have the strength to fight alongside me.
Ryuko, that is crazy!
A bare-skinned human would die if hit by you while synchronized.
She is no ordinary human.
This is the great Satsuki Kiryuin, right?
Very well, strike me.
We face Ragyo Kiryuin.
If I am to fall here, I have no chance of winning this battle.
I shall withstand your blow.
Show me that you are not all talk.
Here it comes.
Gamagoori!
Stay out of this, you bastard!
What is it with you people?!
Are you mocking me, Matoi?
What?!
I am asking you if you threw that punch with everything you had!
Yeah, I did!
Do not make me laugh!
If that is true, why are we still alive?
I thought ordinary humans would die if you hit them full-force!
You got in the way, so I pulled them!
A likely excuse!
You pull your punches just because someone gets in the way?!
Such a woman is not worthy to punch Lady Satsuki!
Do not turn this on me!
No, our anger is directed at the right person!
As if we would allow a half-assed blow like that to land on Lady Satsuki!
What are you two doing?
Our face is Lady Satsuki's face!
Our limbs are Lady Satsuki's limbs!
For her, we could be smashed or sliced off and have no regrets!
However, these limbs have a
mind of their own, so we can be rather obstinate.
We, the Honnouji Academy Elite Four, are
Lady Satsuki's irresistible spear!
Her unyielding shield!
If you want to strike Lady Satsuki, strike us!
But you will find that we do not yield easily!
What the hell is it with you people?!
I do not get you at all
So you are protected by a bunch of bat-crap crazy people just like I am?
So it would seem.
To defeat Ragyo, I must treat all human beings as pawns.
Or so I thought.
I thought the same of you.
Ever since the day you appeared wearing Senketsu,
my intent was to train you into a powerful
asset to turn against Ragyo and her people.
I made you believe I was your father's killer to get you
to come after me and gauged your and Senketsu's power.
If you could hold on to your free will without
being swallowed up by the Kamui,
you would surely prove useful when it was time for the coup against Ragyo.
I believed I could manipulate you and use you
as an asset against Ragyo even without telling you the truth.
You bitch...
However, that was a grave mistake.
In the end, I was employing the same methods as Ragyo.
It is a given that I would not be able to win like that.
The biggest fool here is me.
Satsuki...
I understand now.
The world is not cut from the same cloth.
It is because it is overflowing with inexplicable, unidentifiable things
that the world is so beautiful.
Fight at my side so that we may protect that world, Ryuko!
Sheesh, even when you apologize, you turn it up to 11...
I do not feel like hitting you anymore.
I have people I want to protect, too.
I got no problems with stopping that excessive mother of ours.
Now that you have made up, let us have dinner!
Your croquettes, madam?
That is right, croquettes stuffed full of minced, unidentifiable things!
Dig in, dig in!
Yep, when it comes to unidentifiable things, my family's the best there is!
Dig in, too, Lady Satsuki!
This is...
Yummy, huh?
Yes, it is.
There will be after-dinner tea, as well.
Ryuko.
You were somewhat touched earlier, were not you?
When you heard what Satsuki had to say.
Geez, this outfit does not know when to let up!
You could have come out and told her so.
Seriously, you are so obnoxious!
And you are a woman completely devoid of feminine charm.
Sheesh.
Senketsu, you were lonely from having no
one to talk to for so long, were not you?
That is why you are making all this pointless chitchat.
That is not true!
I am not that prone to feeling lonely!
Fine, fine.
Get all the idle chitchat out of your system while you can.
Pretty soon, we will not have time for it.
She will be coming soon.
It is me.
I see.
Ryuko did, did she?
Yes, have Nui work faster.
What a nuisance my daughters are.
I guess I did not discipline them properly.
Ryuko Matoi!
Satsuki Kiryuin!
I am going to make you pay, you hear?
What I am injecting into Junketsu is
a mixture of Lady Satsuki and Ryuko's blood,
as well as Senketsu's Life Fibers.
In other words, you are using Senketsu's power
to forcibly dye Junketsu with Lady Satsuki's colors.
If I am going to put on something that I cannot wear properly,
we should simply re-tailor it.
It is far too late to be concerned about appearances.
The only thing on your mind is victory, huh?
It looks like you have stripped yourself of all extraneous thoughts.
You are a proper Nudist, yourself.
Iori, status of our own forces?
Come on, nothing?!
You can count on me.
We collected more Life Fibers than we expected.
I am just about to start on manufacturing Goku Uniforms.
Can you manage this by yourself?
I am more than enough!
Three-Star Goku Uniform, Tailor's Regalia!
THREE-STAR GOKU UNIFORM TAILOR'S REGALIA
Ragyo Kiryuin's ultimate objective
is to transform the entire human race into Life Fibers and cover this world.
This is the Starseed Cocoon Sphere.
STARSEED COCOON SPHERE
All of REVOCS' products have Life Fibers incorporated into them.
Upon receiving a powerful signal, those Life Fibers will awaken.
Humans with no resistance to it will be converted into energy sources,
and all clothing will transform into Covers.
Seven billion Covers will rise into the stratosphere and enshroud this planet.
You are telling me that she is trying to make the Earth wear clothing?
That is messed up.
I had heard that she was trying to turn the human race into Life Fibers,
but I had no idea her plan was this epic in scope.
To what end, though?
Life Fibers are an organism that drifts through space.
If they reach a planet that harbors intelligent life,
they because them to evolve into a state more
suitable as an energy source for themselves.
They then cover the planet with the beings
that have been converted into Life Fibers,
and then, using the planet itself as an energy source, because it to explode,
and that force scatters new seeds through space.
That is how they continue to reproduce across the universe.
Good grief, talk about making things up out of whole cloth...
There you go again.
Why do you keep blurting out dumb puns that
we have been restraining ourselves from saying?
I have had just about enough of your lack of tact, you stupid Northern Kanto monkey!
Mock Northern Kanto once more, I will mix you up with limewater and boil you!
Now, now, what is with all the yakking about konnyaku?
That is enough, you two!
Behave yourselves in front of Lady Satsuki!
Do not worry about it, Gamagoori.
Hearing you two bicker makes me feel like I have truly come home.
Yes, madam!
Okay, I have managed to hack into REVOCS' communications satellites.
I will put up a video feed of the Original Life Fiber.
They have beefed up their security, so their cameras are all I can get a peek at.
Ragyo...
Original Life Fiber's destination, Honnouji Academy.
Exactly as expected.
Honnouji Academy?
That is right.
By attaching the Original Life Fiber to the massive
transmitter installed at Honnouji Academy,
she can send out the signal to transform all humanity into Life Fibers.
So to stop her plan, we just need to smash that transmitter, then.
Oh, there is one unexpected item, though.
What is it?
These missiles that are about to strike this ship.
Report stuff like that right away, darn it!
Mr. Mikisugi.
Mister?!
I would like to put you in command of the operation.
M-Me?
I will go with Ryuko to stop Ragyo.
It is inappropriate for someone on the front lines to be in command.
Ah, I follow you.
Elite Four, is that clear?
Yes, madam.
All right, we will see to the destruction of the Honnouji Academy transmitter,
and Satsuki and Ryuko
will keep Ragyo Kiryuin and the Original Life Fiber occupied!
All hands to your posts!
There you go again, telling people what to do.
You are not going?
Can you go?
I have no choice.
Hurry up and get changed, then.
Lady Ryuko, please look after your sister.
I know.
Let us do this, Si Sis...
There is no need to force a pretend sisterly bond.
Your blood is flowing through Junketsu.
That is more than enough.
It is?
Yes.
You two...
You can get maudlin later, Senketsu.
Let us do it!
- Life Fiber Synchronize, Kamui Senketsu! - Life Fiber Override, Kamui Junketsu!
KAMUI SENKETSU KAMUI JUNKETSU
Ryuko.
I see'them.
Senketsu Shippu!
SENKETSU SHIPPU
Grab on!
I do not need your help.
Junketsu Senpu!
JUNKETSU SENPU
It is even absorbed my abilities?!
Hey, not bad!
Let us hurry!
Yeah!
All right, we are setting course for Honnouji Academy!
Satsuki, the ship!
There was another under the water?
What the hell is this?
It appears to be a Covers specialized for combat.
This one will be formidable.
Honnouji Academy Fight Club President Mako Mankanshoku is back in action!
FIGHT CLUB-SPEC TWO-STAR GOKU UNIFORM FIGHT CLUB PRESIDENT MAKO MANKANSHOKU BACK IN ACTION
Rest easy, Ryuko.
I will keep this ship safe!
NEXT EPISODE PREVIEW
To wrap the entire world in a single cloth.
That is Ragyo's giant wrapping cloth.
A SINGLE CLOTH
GIANT WRAPPING CLOTH
This anime would also wrap up
THIS ANIME
if that happened, so Ryuko, Satsuki, and Mako rise up to prevent it,
TO PREVENT IT
RYUKO AND SATSUKI
MAKO
THEN
as do the reconstituted Elite Four!
Next time on Kill la Kill, Imitation Gold!
EPISODE 23 IMITATION GOLD
